message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its immense value and rarity, it's worth noting that the product holds a significant importance to me, reflecting its true worth of $15,000. However, considering your keen interest and appreciation for the product, I am willing to extend a special offer. Would you be interested in acquiring this exceptional item for $13,500? This price not only reflects its value but also allows us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. Looking forward to your positive response.
